titleStmt.title: Toward the vindication of the Second Commandment: by Edm. Gurnay, Bachelour in Divinity, and minister of Gods word at Harpley in Norfolk
titleStmt.author: Gurnay, Edmund, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Buck, one of the printers to the University of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: With a final imprimatur leaf, followed by a blank leaf.
Running title reads: Toward the vindication of the II. Commandment.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
